name: Glube Stranding
description:
Glube, you are our only hope to deliver these goods. Please treat them well!

Please report any bugs/feedback in the comments or @ mention us on Twitter. If you are using a keyboard, use the keys to navigate the pause menu. Thank you for playing!

Controls The Game

This collaboration was made in Unity and Blender over April 1-10, 2022 for Glube Jam. Hmm...

Ben Pence (itch) (twitter): design, development, art, voices

Ben Hopkins (itch) (twitter): design, Glube model

Music by Nihilore
